title: The Character of Cats: The Origins, Intelligence, Behavior, and Stratagems of Felis Silvestris Catus
description: Draws on research and lore to elucidate the mysteries of domestic feline behavior, presenting a scientifically based examination of cat genetics, brain chemistry, evolution, social and predatory behavior, history and superstition, and hunting patterns.Reprint.
author: Stephen Budiansky
